member.name: ID2D1DeviceContext3.CreateSpriteBatch
member.summary: Creates a new, empty sprite batch. After creating a sprite batch, use to add sprites to it, then use to draw it.
member.param: When this method returns, contains a pointer to a new, empty sprite batch to be populated by the app.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1DeviceContext3.DrawSpriteBatch
member.summary: Renders all sprites in the given sprite batch to the device context using the specified drawing options.
member.param: The bitmap from which the sprites are to be sourced. Each sprite’s source rectangle refers to a portion of this bitmap.
The interpolation mode to use when drawing this sprite batch. This determines how Direct2D interpolates pixels within the drawn sprites if scaling is performed.
The additional drawing options, if any, to be used for this sprite batch.

member.name: ID2D1DeviceContext3.DrawSpriteBatch
member.summary: Renders part or all of the given sprite batch to the device context using the specified drawing options.
member.param: The index of the first sprite in the sprite batch to draw.
The number of sprites to draw.
The bitmap from which the sprites are to be sourced. Each sprite's source rectangle refers to a portion of this bitmap.
The interpolation mode to use when drawing this sprite batch. This determines how Direct2D interpolates pixels within the drawn sprites if scaling is performed.
The additional drawing options, if any, to be used for this sprite batch.

member.name: ID2D1DeviceContext3
member.summary: This interface performs all the same functions as the interface, plus it enables functionality for creating and drawing sprite batches.
